alert.note: Alert for Conway; Garland; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Saline; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:19PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Logan, southeastern Johnson, Perry, Conway, northwestern Garland, northwestern Saline, Yell and southern Pope Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1219 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near London to near Gravelly. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Hot Springs Village... Morrilton... Danville... Perryville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Ola... London... Oppelo... Perry... Adona... Sequoya Park... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Happy Bend... Hattieville... Jessieville... Petit Jean River WMA... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 69 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and western Arkansas.
